org.sensorhub.api.persistence

Class StorageDataEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.api.common.Event
      • org.sensorhub.api.persistence.StorageEvent
        • org.sensorhub.api.persistence.StorageDataEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class StorageDataEvent
extends StorageEvent

    Type of event generated when new data is available from storage. It is immutable and carries data records by reference
